this_title: In Borneo, the Land of the Head Hunters
introduction: This film of an expedition to Borneo between 1915-17 has claims to be the first motion picture taken in Borneo. Footage Includes diamond fields in Dutch Borneo, scenes of dancing, pig sacrifice, ritual, warriors, hunters, medicine men & women and feasts. The film also shows the expedition’s journey up river, and agricultural work including rice cultivation and fishing with poison.
chinese_title: In Borneo, the Land of the Head Hunters
